name: Anthony Towns
cooked: Not sure what good you think will come of promoting rationales you think are bad. It’s already easy to do a sybil attack against a more-or-less permissionless wiki page; if you’re going to do anything with it, it’s better to promote whatever signal there is to be found there rather than the noise.
topic_title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
topic_html_title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
raw: Not sure what good you think will come of promoting rationales you think are bad. It's already easy to do a sybil attack against a more-or-less permissionless wiki page; if you're going to do anything with it, it's better to promote whatever signal there is to be found there rather than the noise.
